transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan good evening, good evening.
Customer: Haan sir, hum aara baat kar rahe the, free ho gaye sir aap? I hope aap free ho gaye honge.
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan, boliye.
Customer: Haan, haan boliye.
Executive: Okay, sir, abhi main keh rahi thi ki mujhe aap jo maine aapko do teen product bataye the WhatsApp pe, unki photo bhej do, main add kar de rahi hu unko. Aur aap add jaate hain, thoda sa aur dekhte hain kya changes catalog mein ho sakte hain, better improvement ke liye. Aur baki aap use to sir kar hi rahe ho. Aap isse continue rakho usko. Baki calls vagera pe aap connect karoge to aapka filter out bhi hoga, deal bhi conversion ho jayega. Yahi rehta hai system apna deal conversion ke liye aur kya rehta hai, hai na?
Executive: Maine WhatsApp kiya hua hai, bhej do aap sir abhi free hai to.
Customer: Haan, ye isi chiz mein lage hain, hum dukan ke bare mein baat kar rahe hain, dukan ke bare mein.
Executive: Dekho sir, ye wali chize jab aapko benefit de rahi hain to usko at least aap use karo, abhi achha business milne ka time ho gaya hai aapka. Us chiz ko thoda sa please aap samjhiye.
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan, boliye.
Customer: Hmm, bhej dijiye sir mujhko photo aur ek bari main meeting ka link de rahi hu aapko, ek bar join kar lijiye, main fir aapko bata deti hu chize sari. Kya hai, kya nahi hai, kaise apni, baki sari chize bhi main aapko bata deti hu. Aapko help karengi thodi si.
Customer: Meeting ka link bhej dijiye, register email ID hai sir aapke paas?
Customer: Haan?
Executive: Register email ID hai na, meeting ka link bhej rahi hu aapke paas. Ek bar aap join kar lo sir.
Executive: Dekhna ek bar check karna sir aa gaya aapke paas meeting ka link?
Executive: Check karo ek bar main bhej di hu.
Customer: Meeting kya bata rahe hain?
Executive: Bhej diya hai sir maine.
Executive: Ek bar dekh lete hain na sir products ka changes ka, aap bhi dekh lena main theek kar dungi on the call hi sara kuch.
Executive: Last time maine kar diya tha lagbhag sari chize. Kuch mujhe changes lag rahe hain wo main abhi kar deti hu.
Customer: Mujhe kuch fayda.
Executive: Dekhiye sir, sir chizo ka jo fayda hai wo milne ka time aapko hua hai, four months, three months ka initially to time lagta hi hai consumption pattern bhi set hone mein aur chizo ke liye aap bhi use kare, aap bhi jante hain. Aap khud sochiye sir har mahine 80-80 call agar aap uthayenge kya unme se aapki ek do bhi deal convert nahi hongi? For sure hongi sir agar aap us tarah se apna competition dekhenge, market dekhenge, us accordingly bhi kam karenge to kaise nahi hoga sir, ho jayega deal conversion. Ya to aapko itna call nahi aa raha hota. Aisa bhi to hai na sir agar catalog pe views hi nahi hote, calls hi nahi hoti to aapko kaise pata chalta ki haan mere ko mera catalog kahi profile dikh rahi hai ya kahi se bhi visible ho rahi hai. Hai na? Ye wali chiz bhi to hai na sir. Ye bhi to sochiye aap is tarah se. Visibility nahi hoti to kaise call aur inquiry aa pati, nahi aa pati bilkul bhi. Aur ye sab isliye ho raha hai kyuki aap buylead bhi use kar rahe hain, keyword highlight ho rahe hain aapke. Aapne use kara hai is vajah se ho raha hai sir. Aap continue use rakhenge calls bhi continue aapko aati rahengi. Aap unhe pick karenge, unse customer se baat karenge to aapki deal bhi convert hogi. Din ki do call, teen call aap fix karenge sir to mahine mein aaram se mahine do mahine mein aapki aaram se deal to close hogi na itni call uthaoge aap to. Main manti hu retail call aa rahi hai lekin ek chiz aap ye dekho retail call aa rahi hai to bulk call bhi agar business ke liye aa rahi hai to wo bhi to aap hi ko connect karna padega na sir. Aap hi to usse baat karoge. Hai na? Ab agar aap unse connect karoge usi mein to deal aur plus sir online conversion mein thoda usse time thodi mehnat lagti hai kyuki offline mein product banda chuke dekh sakta hai, shop pe aa sakta hai, aapse mil sakta hai. Offline mein apna, theek hai, ye sab chize rehti hain. Online mein aisa kuch nahi hota hai. Yahi reason hai ki aapka jo deal conversion hai ya jo aapka business hai wo ye soch rahe hain ki conversion ho nahi raha hai, actual mein aisa hai nahi. Actual mein dikkat ye hai sir ki abhi aap use kar rahe hain, catalog naya hai, service bhi nayi hai to usme aap follow karte karte hi deal convert hoti hai. Ye chiz ko please aap thoda sa samjhiye us hisab se use karenge to for sure aapko achha bhi growth hoga, amount bhi recover hoga aur aapka business bhi sahi rahega, achha rahega. Kam se kam aap ye to dekhiye ki aapka AZ Pharma, aapka jo account hai, aapka jo brand hai kam se kam wo promote ho raha hai, uspe calls aa rahi hain, uspe inquiry aa rahi hain. Ek positive side wo wali chiz aap dekhiye please. Agar aap wo chiz nahi dekhenge, use ignore karenge, sirf paiso ke se toleng to nahi ho payegi.
Customer: Are humera, main idhar sun liya.
Executive: Kya keh rahe hain?
Customer: Mera aap catalog kholo.
Executive: Main sirf itna keh rahi hu sir aapse ki ye wali jo chiz hai na aapki catalog ki wo aapko help karti hai but bas yahi hai jo main aapko chize bata rahi hu itna hi hai, long term mein aapko benefit deti hain ye chize. Aap please usko us hisab se use karenge to aapko business milta hi hai.
Customer: Idhar suno aap, idhar suno.
Customer: Aapne catalog kholo.
Executive: Haan, khula hua hai catalog meeting mein bhi main aap join kar lo chaho to, khula hua hai catalog batao.
Customer: Dekhiye, Areebuzoom DSR dekhiye.
Executive: Kya dekhiye?
Customer: Areebuzoom DSR.
Executive: Catalog khol rakha hai maine, product dekh rahi hu, home pe hu, product service pe hu batao.
Speaker 1: The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, usne aapki call ko hold pe rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe.
Speaker 1: The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, usne aapki call ko hold pe rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe.
Speaker 1: The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, usne aapki call ko hold pe rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe.
Speaker 1: The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants executive to open his catalog.

- Customer is not seeing benefits from subscription.



Resolution:

- Executive asked customer to send product photos.

- Executive offered to send a meeting link.

- Executive explained the benefits of using IndiaMART.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog, subscription, buyleads, business
